name: Budget-Conscious Shopping
title: Budget-Conscious Shopping
description: Tailored to your health goals and preferences

meals.description: Savory Indian-style oats with vegetables and protein-rich yogurt
instructions: Dry roast oats in a pan for 3-4 minutes until fragrant
Heat oil in same pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves
Add diced onions and cook until translucent
Add carrots and peas, cook for 3 minutes
Add turmeric, salt, and 1 cup water
Add roasted oats, mix well and cook for 5 minutes
Serve hot with Greek yogurt on the side
meals.goal_alignment: High protein and fiber for satiety, complex carbs for sustained energy

meals.description: Protein-rich lentil curry with aromatic spices served over brown rice
instructions: Cook brown rice in 1.5 cups water for 30 minutes
Pressure cook lentils with turmeric and salt for 3 whistles
Heat oil in pan, add cumin seeds
Add onions, cook until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste, cook for 1 minute
Add tomatoes, all spices, cook until soft
Add cooked lentils, simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with cilantro, serve over rice
meals.goal_alignment: High protein lentils for muscle maintenance, complex carbs for sustained energy

meals.description: Creamy spinach curry with cottage cheese served with whole wheat flatbread
instructions: Blanch spinach in boiling water for 2 minutes, blend to paste
Make dough with flour and water, rest for 15 minutes
Cut paneer into cubes, lightly pan-fry
Heat oil, sauté onions until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies
Add tomatoes, cook until soft
Add spinach paste, garam masala, simmer 5 minutes
Add paneer and cream, cook 3 minutes
Roll and cook rotis on dry pan
Serve hot palak paneer with rotis
meals.goal_alignment: High protein paneer for satiety, iron-rich spinach, controlled portions for weight loss

days.day_notes: Focus on protein-rich Indian comfort foods using affordable pantry staples

variety_score: Excellent variety with different cooking methods (pressure cooking, stovetop, pan-frying) and diverse protein sources (yogurt, lentils, paneer)
goal_alignment: This plan supports weight loss through calorie control while ensuring high protein (100g) for satiety and muscle maintenance. Complex carbs provide sustained energy, and high fiber content (35g) promotes fullness and digestive health.
shopping_tips: Buy in bulk: lentils (5kg bags), rice (10kg), whole wheat flour (5kg), oats (2kg), and spices. These shelf-stable ingredients form the base of multiple meals. Shop seasonal vegetables weekly - onions, tomatoes, and potatoes can be bought in larger quantities. Purchase paneer fresh or make at home to save costs. Greek yogurt can be bought in larger containers. Frozen vegetables like peas are cost-effective and nutritious. Store spices in airtight containers to maintain freshness. Consider buying whole spices and grinding them for better flavor and longer shelf life.
